mapper.select: SELECT g.user_id AS userId, r.rights_id AS rightsId, r.rights_name AS rightsName, r.rights_type AS rightsType from user_group g left join user_rights r on g.rights_type = r.rights_type where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from user_group where user_id = #{userId} and rights_type = #{rightsType}
